S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-1620: Changes to look more closely at the "then" and "else" nodes of an SQL CASE statement and, in situations where one or more SQL NULLs exist, to cast the NULLs to an appropriate type (instead of just casting them to CHAR, which is what Derby did previously).
Contributed by: John Peterson (john.peterson@pega.com)
